meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>notebook</kanji> that is also a <kanji>record book</kanji> is an <vocabulary>account book</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>register</vocabulary>, showing the records of all the transactions that have gone through.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
